handoffs.task: Install second-brain-dev skill and configure sync
handoffs.context: Created WINDOWS_AMP_CONTEXT.md with full setup instructions. Windows Amp needs to: 1) Install skill at C:\Users\jacla\.config\agents\skills\second-brain-dev\SKILL.md, 2) Sync from GitHub, 3) Verify inbox.json access, 4) Report back via threads.json handoff.
